feed.title: Tprrt's Blog - misc
feed.subtitle: Yet another blog about embedded Linux, the open source and hardware

entry.title: My blog opening
entry.summary: Why do I choose to open a new blog and a quick description about the subject that will be treated.
entry.content:
Welcome,

After closing my last blog since seventeen years, in order to share my knowledges and my little experiments about embedded open source. You would have understood it, this blog will mainly speak about embedded Linux operating system, but also about open firmware and rtos, as well as related topics like virtualization, security, etc.

I hope you will like the articles of this blog, enjoy the reading.
